pages.text: The Chemical Thrower is a device that propels fluids from its internal tank. The device can be loaded with any fluid, liquid or gas, and, on right click, will spray it out.

It also features a function to ignite the fluid, if it is flammable. To toggle the pilot light, sneak and rightclick. $(br)Like some other tools, the chemical thrower can be modified in the $(l:patchouli:overview/workbench_and_blueprints)Engineer's Workbench$(). These upgrades affect the size of the tank, range and spread.
The $(#007500)Large Tank$() increases the fluid capacity of the Chemical Thrower by 2000 mb.
The $(#007500)Focused Nozzle$() decreases the spread of fluids sprayed out and also slightly increases their range, allowing you to hit further targets with more precision.
The $(#007500)Multitank$() allows the Chemthrower to store up to three different Fluids.

You can select the active tank by sneaking and using the scrollwheel, or through use of the keybind Switch Chemthrower Tanks if it has been set in the options. $(br)This upgrade is mutually exclusive to the $(#007500)Large Tank$().
